description: Episode number 12 of Series "The Worlds of childhood". Discusses research concerning attachment relationships in terms of caregiver sensitivity, predictability and respect for children as individuals. Follows Italian pre-schoolers setting out to explore a cave and examines the effect of dependence on children's ability to engage the world independently.
